Posts.EditableText: Is it possible to save progress in quest? If so, how?
Posts.HTML: Is it possible to save progress in quest? If so, how?

Posts.EditableText:
On the desktop version I'm making a command line game.  All the player has to do is type "save" and a file dialog comes up.
That was built in already.
Posts.HTML:
On the desktop version I'm making a command line game. All the player has to do is type "save" and a file dialog comes up.
That was built in already.

Posts.EditableText: You can also save from the file menu on the desktop version, or click the "Save" top right of the screen on the web version.
Posts.HTML: You can also save from the file menu on the desktop version, or click the "Save" top right of the screen on the web version.
